column4: I have an ext3 partition on an lvm2 disk (hardware raid5 arrray) which is running out of free space, when i add another disk array to the lvm and grow the ext3 partition. Will lvm first use the first array untill it is completely filled and then the second?
Or will lvm start striping between the 2 arrays?
likely the first. you can tell it to do either, but it's a bit of a pain vs just letting it do whatever it wants for expanding
